feed.title: Lens for Plausible Releases
feed.subtitle: Self-hosted software releases generated by selfh.st

entry.title: New release for JellyBoxPlayer: v1.7.1
entry.content: This release is just a version bump to prevent android to complain about new version upgrade.

entry.title: New release for JellyBoxPlayer: v1.8.0
entry.content:
• Fixed blank library selection screen
  • Skip library selection screen if it was previously selected(you need to select it at least once in this new version)
  • Fixed incorrect filters sorting on albums page when switching from artists

entry.title: New release for JellyBoxPlayer: v1.8.2
entry.content:
Added

  • Random sorting order
  • Media Hotkeys on macOS platform
  • Auto library saving after its been selected(you need to select library at least once after installing update)

Fixed

  • Silent crash due to incorrect data type returned by Jellyfin
  • Missing libraries

entry.title: New release for JellyBoxPlayer: v1.8.3
entry.content:
Added

  • Allow passwordless login - simply keep password field empty if your account does not have password
  • Updated API
